application_information.description: checkout.shop100.store is a platform that allows customers to manage all their orders from merchants' store fronts that are powered by Shop100. Customers can have a centralized point of access to orders they created across multiple store fronts on Shop100.
application_information.about_this_app:
checkout.shop100.store is a platform that allows customers to manage all their orders from merchants' store fronts that are powered by Shop100. Customers can have a centralized point of access to orders they created across multiple store fronts on Shop100. 
  Key Features: 
 - **Centralized Order Management**: Manage orders from multiple Shop100 store fronts in one place. 
 - **Enhanced User Interface**: Enjoy a seamless and engaging user experience. 
 - **Secure Transactions**: Improved security features to protect user data and ensure safe transactions. 
 For more information or support, visit the [Shop100 Help Center](https://checkout.shop100.store/help) or contact Shop100 support at [support@shop100.com](mailto:support@shop100.com).
application_information.required_os: Android 6.0> or iOS 12.0> or Web Browser
